job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Software Engineer  tl;dr: An innovative seed-stage startup in the DevSecOps space is looking for a Software Engineer (fullstack) to join our team and help design and build a greenfield cybersecurity product using bleeding edge technology. Our tech-stack and R&D culture   As this is a greenfield application, we do not have all the details ironed out, you will help us do that. However, we do know we will be using:   ●      Node.js backend   ●      React / Vue / Angular frontend   ●      TypeScript on both   ●      Serverless, kubernetes, AWS   ●      Neo4j, MongoDB   We will be putting a high emphasis on:   ●      Honing your skills   ●      SOLID design principles   ●      Highly maintainable and testable code   ●      Non-blocking automatic CI/CD pipeline   ●      Letting developers develop and not distract them with endless unneeded meetings, procedures and rules   ●      Involvement and impact on the decision making process and roadmap of a new product   ●      Open-source use and contribute   What do we expect you to bring to the table?  We believe that for every highly functioning relationship, there must be a good synergy between the partners and that it must be a win-win situation for all.   Our key requirements are:   ●      Enjoy your work and working with your team and be proud of it   ●      Assume best intentions – we know we will!   ●      Drive to build something amazing   ●      Be excited about data and coding   ●      Have strong opinions, but hold them loosely     What will you be doing? As a seed-stage team member, you will be working on a greenfield application and ML models. You will be an integral part of the design and architecture decision process, working directly with the other team members and leadership (we have a very flat structure). In this role you will have a huge impact on the success of the company.
